A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
No closure on snoke\, seriously that character is still a huge friggin "what the..?"\,  no closure on Rey's background or training\, little to no closure on luke or the Jedi order. Injected love story for finn. 
Which isn't horrible\, but it's one more thing that distracts from what I've already listed as a complaint.  No background on how the first order rose to power...

This is such a let down so many things should've been dealt with
